properties.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 16 at 7:04AM CST until February 16 at 10:00AM CST by NWS Mobile AL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Mobile has issued a

* Urban and Small Stream Flood Advisory for...
Central Mobile County in southwestern Alabama...
West central Baldwin County in southwestern Alabama...

* Until 1000 AM CST.

* At 703 AM CST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to showers
and a few isolate thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small
stream flooding in the advisory area. Up to 2 inches of rain have
already fallen in some locations.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Prichard, Saraland, Bay Minette, Chickasaw, Satsuma, Creola,
Semmes, I65 And I165 and I65 And AL 158.

Additional rainfall of up to around 1 inch is expected over the
area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.
